content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position (x)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x)

### Iron plate crafting area
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z) for crafting iron gear wheels
- Assembling machine (position a) for crafting iron sticks
- Inserter (position b) that puts into assembling machine for iron gear wheels
- Inserter (position c) that puts into assembling machine for iron sticks

### Inventory
- Current inventory includes 9 iron plates and 10 coal.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires 2 iron plates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors when crafting items without the necessary machines
- Verify that you have the correct crafting machine or furnace available for the items you want to craft.
